title: User Authentication and Access Management
summary: Implement secure login with multi-factor authentication and role-based access control.
description: Develop a robust authentication system that supports multi-factor authentication (MFA) to ensure secure access to the self-service portal. Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure users can only view and manage services applicable to their authorization level. The solution should manage user sessions securely, support password recovery, and integrate seamlessly with the bank’s existing identity management systems.

title: Customer Dashboard and Personalization
summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying banking products and services relevant to the customer.
description: Design and implement a personalized, user-friendly dashboard that presents relevant banking products, services, and account information based on the customer’s profile and eligibility. The dashboard should provide real-time data, quick links to key actions, and support modular widgets for different service categories.

title: Responsive User Interface Development
summary: Build a responsive and consistent user interface accessible across devices.
description: Develop the portal using responsive design principles to ensure consistent performance and usability across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. The design should align with the bank’s branding guidelines and include accessibility compliance for all supported platforms.

title: Account Management and Service Requests
summary: Enable customers to open new accounts and modify existing services through guided workflows.
description: Implement streamlined, intuitive workflows that enable users to open new accounts or modify existing banking services with minimal steps. Include features for guided forms, auto-filled customer details, and progress tracking within each workflow. Users should be able to save partially completed applications and resume them later.

title: Document Upload and Management
summary: Allow customers to securely upload and manage documentation within the portal.
description: Build functionality to enable secure document uploads directly through the portal. Support various file types, enforce document validation, and ensure encrypted storage and transmission. Include tools for customers to view, replace, or delete uploaded documents as needed, complying with regulatory standards.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Tracking
summary: Provide real-time status updates and notifications for all service requests.
description: Implement a notification engine that delivers real-time updates on submitted service or account requests via portal alerts and email. Customers should be able to view detailed request statuses within the portal, including processing stages, expected timelines, and outcome summaries.

title: Customer Interaction History and Activity Logs
summary: Maintain a comprehensive record of customer interactions and activities.
description: Develop a secure logging mechanism to record all user interactions and activities within the portal, such as service requests, document uploads, and account modifications. Provide customers with an accessible history view while ensuring data integrity and protection from unauthorized access.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core banking system for synchronized operations.
description: Design and implement APIs and middleware components to connect the self-service portal with the core banking system. Ensure real-time synchronization of customer data, account details, and transactional records while maintaining system performance, fault tolerance, and data security.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop the portal’s own database architecture for optimal performance and reliability.
description: Set up and optimize a dedicated database to store user session data, application records, and portal-specific metadata. Ensure high availability, efficient querying, and robust backup mechanisms while implementing strong encryption and compliance with data protection laws.

title: Security, Compliance, and Data Protection
summary: Implement end-to-end security and compliance measures for all portal operations.
description: Establish advanced security features across the portal, including encryption in transit and at rest, vulnerability scanning, and adherence to financial security standards such as PCI DSS and GDPR. Regularly perform audits and penetration testing to ensure continued protection of customer data and regulatory compliance.
